title: Hindi: Bollywood Classics - Mohammad Rafi (mega compilation)
description:
Hindi: Bollywood Classics - Mohammad Rafi (mega compilation) 

Mohammed Rafi (December 24, 1924 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ July 31, 1980) was a popular Indian playback singer. He sang in many Indian languages, but he is primarily remembered for his songs from Hindi cinema. He was one of the leading male Bollywood playback singers from the 1950s to the 1970s. My favourite among the male singers.
